titles.title: Changing the size of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.
Changing the size of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Amends Rule X (Organization of Committees) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the composition of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence 21 to 22 Members, Delegates, or the Resident Commissioner, of whom not more than 13 (currently, 12) may be from the same party.
